Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)

babylon_pk.description: babylon_pk is the Babylon secp256k1 PK of this finality provider

btc_pk_hex.description: btc_pk_hex is the Bitcoin secp256k1 PK of this finality provider the PK follows encoding in BIP-340 spec in hex format

chain_id.description: chain_id is the chain id of the chain the finality provider is operating on. If it's missing / empty, it's assumed the finality provider is operating in the Babylon chain.

commission.description: commission defines the commission rate of the finality provider.

description.description: description defines the description terms for the finality provider

master_pub_rand.description: master_pub_rand is the master public randomness of the finality provider encoded as a base58 string

pop.description: pop is the proof of possession of the babylon_pk and btc_pk

registered_epoch.description: registered_epoch is the epoch when this finality provider is registered

slashed_babylon_height.description: slashed_babylon_height indicates the Babylon height when the finality provider is slashed. if it's 0, then the finality provider is not slashed

slashed_btc_height.description: slashed_btc_height indicates the BTC height when the finality provider is slashed. if it's 0, then the finality provider is not slashed

details.description: details is the details of the finality provider

identity.description: identity is the identity of the finality provider

moniker.description: moniker is the name of the finality provider

security_contact.description: security_contact is the security contact of the finality provider

website.description: website is the website of the finality provider

ProofOfPossession.description: ProofOfPossession is the proof of possession that a Babylon secp256k1 secret key and a Bitcoin secp256k1 secret key are held by the same person

babylon_sig.description: babylon_sig is the signature generated via sign(sk_babylon, pk_btc)

btc_sig.description: btc_sig is the signature generated via sign(sk_btc, babylon_sig) the signature follows encoding in either BIP-340 spec or BIP-322 spec

btc_sig_type.description: btc_sig_type indicates the type of btc_sig in the pop

PubKey.description: PubKey defines a secp256k1 public key. Key is the compressed form of the pubkey. The first byte is a 0x02 byte if the y-coordinate is the lexicographically largest of the two associated with the x-coordinate. Otherwise, the first byte is a 0x03. This prefix is followed with the x-coordinate.

key.description: key is the compressed public key of the finality provider
